languages.text: "К'хо мр'даш'нг ро фнагл хепт! Ха-а..." {n}Извращенный утробный голос вырывается из глотки существа за вашей спиной, и оно заходится смехом. Его желтые зрачки манят неестественным свечением, а безобразные губы кривятся, растягивая улыбку все шире, и шире... Пока тонкая кожа не разрывается с треском, обнажая ряды острых зубов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "К'хо мр'даш'нг ро фнагл хепт! Ха-а..." {n}Извращенный утробный голос вырывается из глотки существа за вашей спиной, и оно заходится смехом. Его желтые зрачки манят неестественным свечением, а безобразные губы кривятся, растягивая улыбку все шире, и шире... Пока тонкая кожа не разрывается с треском, обнажая ряды острых зубов.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a..." {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the throat of the creature behind you. It roars with laughter. The yellow pupils lure you in with an unnatural glow, the disfigured lips twisting, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n}
languages.original_text: "К'хо мр'даш'нг ро фнагл хепт! Ха-а..." {n}Извращенный утробный голос вырывается из глотки существа за вашей спиной, и оно заходится смехом. traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: 「コー・ムル・ダッシュン・ロー・フナグル・ヘプト！ハ…ア…」{n}その生き物の喉から、歪んだ、耳障りな声が炸裂し、笑い声が轟く。その瞼が開き、黄色い瞳孔の不自然な輝きが脳裏に焼き付く。醜い唇が歪み、その笑みはだんだんと大きなものになり…薄い皮膚が破れて何本もの鋭い歯が露わになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a..." {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the throat of the creature behind you. It roars with laughter. The yellow pupils lure you in with an unnatural glow, the disfigured lips twisting, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「コー・ムル・ダッシュン・ロー・フナグル・ヘプト！ハ…ア…」{n}その生き物の喉から、歪んだ、耳障りな声が炸裂し、笑い声が轟く。その瞼が開き、黄色い瞳孔の不自然な輝きが脳裏に焼き付く。醜い唇が歪み、その笑みはだんだんと大きなものになり…薄い皮膚が破れて何本もの鋭い歯が露わになった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: «¡K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a...». {n}Una voz retorcida y gutural brota de la garganta de la criatura que tienes detrás. Ríe a carcajadas. Sus pupilas amarillas te distraen con un brillo antinatural y los labios deformes se tuercen, haciendo que la sonrisa se ensanche más y más... hasta que la piel se rompe con un chasquido, revelando una hilera de dientes tras otra.{/n}
languages.original_text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a..." {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the throat of the creature behind you. It roars with laughter. The yellow pupils lure you in with an unnatural glow, the disfigured lips twisting, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a...». {n}Una voz retorcida y gutural brota de la garganta de la criatura que tienes detrás. Ríe a carcajadas. Sus pupilas amarillas te distraen con un brillo antinatural y los labios deformes se tuercen, haciendo que la sonrisa se ensanche más y más... hasta que la piel se rompe con un chasquido, revelando una hilera de dientes tras otra.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: “K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a……”{n}你身后的怪物从喉咙里迸射出扭曲喑哑的声音，紧接着又是一串大笑。那对黄色的瞳孔放射出不自然的光彩，你不由自主地看着它，看着它畸形的嘴角不断向两边延伸、延伸……直到薄薄的嘴唇突然裂开，露出一排排尖利的牙齿。{/n}
languages.original_text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a..." {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the throat of the creature behind you. It roars with laughter. The yellow pupils lure you in with an unnatural glow, the disfigured lips twisting, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a……”{n}你身后的怪物从喉咙里迸射出扭曲喑哑的声音，紧接着又是一串大笑。那对黄色的瞳孔放射出不自然的光彩，你不由自主地看着它，看着它畸形的嘴角不断向两边延伸、延伸……直到薄薄的嘴唇突然裂开，露出一排排尖利的牙齿。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: « K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept ! Ha-a... » {n}Vous tournez le dos à la créature, jusqu'à ce qu'une voix gutturale déformée se fasse entendre. L'abomination rugit de rire. Ses pupilles jaunes qui luisent d'un éclat étrange attirent votre attention, et ses lèvres déformées se tordent encore plus pour former un large sourire qui ne cesse de grandir... jusqu'à ce que sa peau se déchire dans un grand craquement, révélant des rangs entiers de dents acérées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a..." {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the throat of the creature behind you. It roars with laughter. The yellow pupils lure you in with an unnatural glow, the disfigured lips twisting, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept ! Ha-a... » {n}Vous tournez le dos à la créature, jusqu'à ce qu'une voix gutturale déformée se fasse entendre. L'abomination rugit de rire. Ses pupilles jaunes qui luisent d'un éclat étrange attirent votre attention, et ses lèvres déformées se tordent encore plus pour former un large sourire qui ne cesse de grandir... jusqu'à ce que sa peau se déchire dans un grand craquement, révélant des rangs entiers de dents acérées.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a ..." {n}Eine verzerrte, kehlige Stimme ertönt aus dem Mund der Kreatur hinter dir. Sie brüllt vor Lachen. Die gelben Pupillen locken dich mit einem unnatürlichen Strahlen, die entstellten Lippen verzerren sich, das Grinsen wird immer breiter und breiter ... Bis die dünne Haut mit einem scharfen Knall reißt und Reihe um Reihe spitzer Zähne preisgibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a..." {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the throat of the creature behind you. It roars with laughter. The yellow pupils lure you in with an unnatural glow, the disfigured lips twisting, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n}

Die gelben Pupillen locken dich mit einem unnatürlichen Strahlen, die entstellten Lippen verzerren sich, das Grinsen wird immer breiter und breiter ... Bis die dünne Haut mit einem scharfen Knall reißt und Reihe um Reihe spitzer Zähne preisgibt.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha..." {n}Arkandaki yaratığın gırtlağından çarpık ve boğuk bir ses çıkıyor. Uğultuyla kahkaha atmaya başlıyor. Sarı göz bebeklerinin gayritabii parıltısı, seni cezbederek yaklaşmanı sağlıyor. Biçimi bozulmuş dudakları bükülüp gittikçe daha da geniş gülümsemeye başlıyor... Ardından da keskin bir çat sesiyle ince derisi çatlayarak sıra sıra dizilmiş keskin dişlerini açığa çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept! Ha-a..." {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the throat of the creature behind you. It roars with laughter. The yellow pupils lure you in with an unnatural glow, the disfigured lips twisting, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n}
